namespace UsersWithFriends.Services

        public ServiceResponse<User> GetUser(int userId)
        {
            using (var db = new DataContext())
            {
                var item = db.Users
                             .Where(item => item.Id == userId).FirstOrDefault();
                if (item == null)
                    return new ServiceResponse<User>
                    {
                        StatusCode = 404
                    };
                return new ServiceResponse<User>
                {
                    StatusCode = 200,
                    ResponseData = item
                };
            }
        }

        public ServiceResponse<User> AddUser(User user)
        {
            EntityEntry<User> entityEntry;
            try
            {
                using (var db = new DataContext())
                {
                    entityEntry = db.Users.Add(user);
                    db.SaveChanges();
                }
            } catch (DbUpdateException)
            {
                return new ServiceResponse<User>
                {
                    StatusCode = 400
                };
            }
            return new ServiceResponse<User>
            {
                StatusCode = 200,
                ResponseData = entityEntry.Entity
            };
        }

        public ServiceResponse<User> UpdateUser(int userId, User user)
        {
            try
            {
                using (var db = new DataContext())
                {
                    var original = db.Users
                                .Where(item => item.Id == userId).FirstOrDefault();
                    EntityEntry<User> entityEntry;
                    entityEntry = db.Users.Update(original);
                    original.Name = user.Name;
                    db.SaveChanges();
                    return new ServiceResponse<User>
                    {
                        StatusCode = 200,
                        ResponseData = entityEntry.Entity
                    };
                }
            } catch (DbUpdateException)
            {
                return new ServiceResponse<User>

                    StatusCode = 400
                };
            }
        }

        public ServiceResponse DeleteUser(int userId)
        {
            try
            {
                using (var db = new DataContext())
                {
                    var item = db.Users.Where(item => item.Id == userId).FirstOrDefault();
                    if (item == null)
                        return new ServiceResponse
                        {
                            StatusCode = 400
                        };
                    db.Users.Remove(item);
                    db.SaveChanges();
                }
            } catch (DbUpdateException)
            {
                return new ServiceResponse
                {
                    StatusCode = 400
                };
            }
            return new ServiceResponse
            {
                StatusCode = 200
            };
